com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.language_translation.v2

Class LanguageTranslation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.language_translation.v2.LanguageTranslation

  • public class LanguageTranslation
extends WatsonService
    The IBM Watson Language Translator service translate text from one language to another and identifies the language in which text is written.
    Version:
    v2
    See Also:
    Language translation

      • translate

                                                String modelId)

        Returns:
